Translations.Text: His companion dir Our Lord mi ne mislead him; li est far astray
Li dir ne feud Me mi suficx avert vi
Nothing sxangx nun. Mi est neniam unjust towards popol
Est tag when ni pet Infer Hav vi hav suficx Gxi dir Don me plur
Paradise ofert righteous readily
This est ki promes cxiu repenter steadfast
Ili reverenced plej Gracious en their privacy ven wholeheartedly
Enter gxi pac; this est Tag Eternity
Ili get anything ili wish therein ni hav eben plur
Many generaci them est powerful ni annihilated Ili sercx land; ili trov escape
This est lecion everyone posed mens est able al auxd witness
Ni kre heavens ter cxio them 6 tag neni fatigue tusx us
Do est pacient en des vizagx de their utterances lauxd glor your Lord antaux sunrise antaux sunset
Nokt vi medit His nom post prostrating
prepar tag when caller vok met est proksim
When ili auxd inevitable cry est tag vi ven
Ni est unu control life death; us est final destiny
Tag ven when ter krak en a hurry don roz them! Such summoning est facil por us do
Ni est fully aware da cxio ili utter while vi ne hav potenc them. Do remind this Quran those reverence My warnings
blov vent
Bor pluv
Bringing provisions
Distribu them as komand
Ki promes vi surely ven pas
Tag Judgment est inevitable
Despite perfectly kre cxiel
Vi ad disput truth
Deviating therefrom est deviators
Ve al falsifiers
En their blundering ili est totally heedless
Ili question Tag Judgment
Tag ili prezent fajr
Gust retribution; this est ki vi uz challenge
righteous ind gxarden printemp
Ili ricev their Lord's rekompenc ili uz est pi
Rarely did ili dorm whole nokt
Je dawn ili pregx forgiveness
portion their mon est set aside por beggar needy
Ter est plen da sign those est nepr
within vi seg
En heaven est your provision cxio promes vi
Per Lord de heaven ter this est as prav as ti vi parol
Vi not histori Abraham's honorable gast
Ili vizit him dir Pac. Li dir Pac al vi strangers
Li pet his famili prepar fat calf
When li ofert gxi them li remarked vi ne mangx
Li harbored tim de them! Ili dir ne Hav tim ili don bon news knowledgeable fil
His wife astonished Not her wrinkled vizagx mi est sterile old woman
Ili dir Tiel dir your Lord Li est plej Sagx Omniscient
